description: This is a Dart source file defining a Flutter widget for the home screen of a Foodie Delivery App. It contains UI layout code with custom components, styling, and user interaction handlers.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that builds the main grid displaying restaurant options and categories.

classes.name: _RestaurantCard
classes.description: A widget representing a clickable card for each restaurant with icon and text.

classes.name: _ChipPill
classes.description: A style custom chip pill widget indicating a category with an icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI layout of the HomeScreen, including the app bar, lists, and buttons.
